title: Mac League Patcher keeps closing itself before it finishes updating
body:
I've tried reinstalling it, restarting my computer, reopening the Launcher about 20 times, it stays open for until it loads to about 70ish % and then just randomly closes and when I open it again I have to start all over. Any ideas what could be causing this? I played a few days ago and it was fine, now I can't even update let alone log in. 

My computer is a Mac using OS X Yosemite version 10.10.3 if that matters. 
Please help if you can!

replies.body:
Look over [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#section-mac) and try everything there. If that doesn't work, then reply to this message.

Best of luck.
I tried all of these things and it still isn't working. :(

Ok, so that's the basics over.

Do you have any third-party software installed on your Mac that is designed to monitor/observe or otherwise overview any applications that are running? If so, try uninstalling it and repatch League. This includes anti-virus software and firewalls (if you uninstall a paid software, make sure you have a way to reinstall without buying again first!)

If you have anything such as a VPN or proxy in your network setup, try patching without those. If you don't know what I'm talking about, then you probably shouldn't worry (unless you aren't the person who setup your internet connection).

Of course, make sure everything is updated and maintained.

Get back to me soon.
